text:
## All 3 PRs Updated

### PR #247 (directed-inputs-class decorator API)
- ✅ Added type coercion error handling (try/except for conversion failures)
- ✅ Fixed README python-terraform-bridge link to monorepo path

### PR #252 (py3.9 ci fix)
- ✅ Fixed stdin size limit race condition (read limit first, then peek for extra)
- ✅ Removed duplicate union type handling from `_coerce_value` (already handled by `_resolve_type_hint`)
- ✅ Added error handling for type coercion

### PR #253 (python-terraform-bridge fixes)
- ✅ Completed truncated `_print_help` method (was missing data source/null resource listing)
